events_detail.description: Fundraising: Donate to the Relief Fund. Help by donating any amount to support the purchase of blankets and clothing for families affected by the winter storm.
Gathering Materials: Bring Warm Clothing. Please bring warm clothing and blankets to the Boston Community Center on December 6th at 10 AM.
Logistics: Help Set Up. Join us at the distribution center on December 10th at 8 AM to help set up for the event.
